com.rapidminer.operator.modelling.adapters

Class MLNInferenceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.operator.modelling.adapters.MLNAbstractAdapter
      • com.rapidminer.operator.modelling.adapters.MLNInferenceAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlchemyInferenceAdapter, RockitInferenceAdapter, TuffyInferenceAdapter

    public abstract class MLNInferenceAdapter
extends MLNAbstractAdapter
    Defines abstract methods for an MLN inference adapter and provides an inference adapter for an engine.
    Author:
    Yann Kiraly

      • getAdapterForEngine

        public static MLNInferenceAdapter getAdapterForEngine(MLNEngine engine)
        Returns an inference adapter for an MLNEngine based on the MLNEngine specification in MLNEngineSpecification.xml.
        Parameters:
        engine: - MLNEngine that an adapter is required for.
        Returns:
        MLNInferenceAdapter: Inference adapter for the specified engine.
        Throws:
        com.rapidminer.operator.OperatorException
